items.sentence: Tom showed up at the party dressed like a pirate.
Tom slipped on ice and broke his hip last winter.
Tom speaks French as if he were a native speaker.
Mary always wants Tom to talk about his feelings.
Meet me here again next Monday afternoon at 2:30.
Tom usually arrives home just in time for dinner.
Tom usually cleans his room at least once a week.
Tom usually does this kind of thing very quickly.
A friend of mine asked me to send her a postcard.
Are you sure Tom will let us sing with his group?
Did Tom meet the criteria for passing this class?
Did Tom tell you how long it took him to do that?
If they don\'t want this, then what do they want?
If you did that, they\'d kick you out of the bar.
Saint Patrick\'s Day is celebrated on March 17th.
Tom told Mary that he\'d go to Boston in October.
I didn\'t know that Tom didn\'t know how to swim.
Everyone is entitled to be moody once in a while.
Tom stood up and followed Mary out of the office.
Tom suggested that I accompany Mary to the party.
